      • calc

        public CoordinateData calc(double[] mass,
                           double[][] x0,
                           double[] hessian)
        Calculate the normal coordinates and the harmonic frequencies.
        Parameters:
        mass - mass of the atoms [Nat] (emu)
        x0 - XYZ coordinates of the reference geometry [Nat][3] (bohr)
        hessian - Hessian matrix in packed form [Nat*3*(Nat*3+1)/2] (Hartree/bohr^2)
        Returns:
        Normal coordinates
